main.name: REGAL
main.tagLine: Reign in Regal elegance, embrace your ethnic heritage.
main.description: Welcome to our ethnic clothing brand, where we invite you to immerse yourself in a world of timeless elegance and cultural opulence. With every intricate stitch and meticulous detail, we strive to capture the essence of royalty and celebrate the richness of ethnic heritage.
main.bio: Use this bio section as your way of describing yourself and saying what you do, what technologies you like to use or feel most comfortable with, describing your personality, or whatever else you feel like throwing in.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers
